sentences.en: He is repentant of [ for ] his sins.
sentences.cn: 他对于自己所犯的罪 后悔 不已.

sentences.en: He is repentant of his folly.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的愚蠢行为而懊恼.

sentences.en: He was feeling guilty and depressed, repentant and scared.
sentences.cn: 他感到内疚、沮丧、后悔和害怕。

sentences.en: He was repentant when he saw what he'd done.
sentences.cn: 他看到自己的作为,心里悔恨.

sentences.en: Her darling boy was to back to her repentant tender - hearted.
sentences.cn: 回去了,但一切安好.于是我决定回来.

sentences.en: Her darling boy was to come back to her repentant and tender - hearted.
sentences.cn: 她的宝贝孩子即将怀着悔罪和体贴的心回到她的身边.

sentences.en: I'll be meek under their coldness and repentant of my evil ways.
sentences.cn: 我愿意乖乖地忍受她们的奚落,忏悔我过去的恶行.

sentences.en: If he is really repentant, we should forgive him.
sentences.cn: 如果他真心悔过, 我们就应该原谅他.

sentences.en: Many Nazi criminals, repentant or not, served shorter sentences, he says.
sentences.cn: 他还补充到,许多纳粹战犯, 无论是否有悔过之心, 服刑期都比克拉尔短.

sentences.en: Note the sincerity of our repentant tears; mingle in our simple sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 注意我们真诚悔改的眼泪, 和我们一同作纯朴的奉献吧.

sentences.en: She had fired off the repentant cable.
sentences.cn: 她赶紧发了一份表示忏悔的电报.

sentences.en: The gunman, now in police custody, is repentant.
sentences.cn: 这名持枪歹徒现在已经被警方拘留, 他感到很悔恨.

sentences.en: There stood Shirley in the gallery , looking contrite, ashamed, sorry as any repentant child.
sentences.cn: 谢利站在过道上,象个悔悟的小孩那样, 显得后悔, 羞渐, 难受.

sentences.en: They are very repentant and sorry for what they've done.
sentences.cn: 她们对她们所做的事表示悔改和歉意.

sentences.en: Zion will be redeemed with justice And her repentant ones with righteousness.
sentences.cn: 赛1:27锡安必因公平得蒙救赎、其中归正的人、必因公义得蒙救赎.

words.tran_cn: [植] 匍匐生根的；[动] 爬行的

trans.tran_en: sorry for something wrong that you have done
